content: *nothing complicated just super simple grannies with colours to warm the heart all jazzed up with a dingly dangly border * **pattern notes** a full written pattern for a blanket made from classic granny squares together with joining and border instructions the border circles are optional instructions given for both **skill level** *easy/improver* made up of simple granny squares with a basic joining technique some experience with intermediate patterns would be helpful for the border **yarn** stylecraft special dk 19 balls of stylecraft special in 9 colours 3 balls of fondant 2 balls of all other colours 1003 - aster 1005 - cream 1034 - sherbert 1130 - candy floss 1241 - fondant 1246 - lipstick 1822 - pistachio 1823 - mustard 1824 - cypress green or approximately 5500 yards of your own choice of dk yarn **needles/hook** 4mm g usa **materials** yarn needle **size** 195 x 130cm 78 x 51 **gauge** 11cm 4 5 per square **pattern includes ** - full written pattern - tutorial links for granny square and joining technique - options for border with or without dangly circles - stitch abbreviations **pattern written in ** uk terms us terms **cherry heart s cozy corner** please come and join the cherry heart group 1 watch podcasts join crochet/knit alongs share your projects and enjoy yarny chit chat **love to share ** #cherryheart 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/cherry-hearts-cozy-corner
